answers.author: Derek Johnson
answers.text:
Hello,
ICMA contracts their printing/copy services out to Capitol Office Solutions, a one-stop office services shop that handles our printing and copying needs. They were recently acquired by Xerox, so all their technology and services are compatible with Xerox products. 
http://www.capitolofficesolutions.com/
Headquarters
9065 Guilford Rd
Columbia MD 21046
Toll Free: 888-937-2345
Ph: 301-210-4360
Fax: 301-210-3040
I believe COS services the Mid-Atlantic region, so if your municipality falls outside their purview, I would recommend looking for a similar organization in your area. Our office manager Kenneth Belton is available if you would like to find out more about the specifics of these services. 
Facilities Manager
ICMA
Washington DC
United States
Phone
(202) 962-3654
Email
kbelton@icma.org
Hope you find this information helpful. Take care and good luck.
Derek Johnson

answers.author: Derek Johnson
answers.text:
ICMA's facilities manager Kenneth Belton has reviewed your question and emailed me the following statement regarding COS: 
"What we have done here at ICMA is gone with a dual system of having small jobs done in house and larger more complicated jobs done professionally by the copier center in the building. This is a Xerox company that will charge more per copy than the .002 cents per black and white copy average in the suite. If color copies are requested the cost increases quickly, so we ask hard questions about why color copies are necessary for jobs with color scopes.  Having a quality in house color copy solutions is critical for quick turn around and cost effectiveness but making sure that you have the right mix for quality copies is something that everyone needs to be aware is a reality." 
Hope that gives you a little more detail.

author: [Anonymous]
text: Our local government operates an in house Print Shop.  Due to a severe drop off in utitlization we need to design a new model for providing services moving forward.  Has any other locality outsourced their Printing Services or offer a hybrid?  Any case studies or RFI examples?
title: Outsourcing Printing Services
